Pre-Game Insights: Colombia are unbeaten in the qualifiers with a last-gasp equalizer against Peru last week.
Argentina are heavy favorites, already securing their flights to North America for the World Cup.
James Rodríguez is expected to start and be crucial for Colombia.
Julian Álvarez will rise in Messi's absence for Argentina.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is a repeat of the Copa America final from July.
Colombia are third in the qualifying standings with 13 points.
Argentina have won five of their last six qualifiers.
Others: Key players to watch include James Rodríguez for Colombia and Julian Álvarez for Argentina.
